Guacamole.ingredients:
Avocado
Tomato
Onion
Lime Juice
Salt
Cilantro
Guacamole.instructions:
1. Mash avocados in a bowl. 
2. Add diced tomatoes, finely chopped onions, lime juice, salt, and chopped cilantro. 
3. Mix ingredients thoroughly. 
4. Serve with chips or use as a topping.

Vegetable Stir-Fry.ingredients:
Assorted Vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
 Soy Sauce
 Garlic
 Ginger
 Sesame Oil
Vegetable Stir-Fry.instructions:
1. Heat sesame oil in a pan or wok. 
2. Sauté minced garlic and ginger until fragrant. 
3. Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp
4. Pour soy sauce over the vegetables and toss well. 
5. Serve hot.

Fruit Salad.ingredients:
Mixed Fruit (strawberries, blueberries, pineapple, grapes)
 Honey
 Lime Juice
 Mint Leaves
Fruit Salad.instructions:
1. Wash and chop fruits into bite-sized pieces. 
2. Mix the fruits in a bowl. 
3. Drizzle honey and lime juice over the fruits. 
4. Garnish with fresh mint leaves. 
5. Chill before serving.

Pasta Primavera.ingredients:
Pasta
Assorted Vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, broccoli)
Olive Oil
Garlic
Parmesan Cheese
Fresh Basil
Pasta Primavera.instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 
2. In a pan, sauté minced garlic in olive oil until fragrant. 
3. Add chopped vegetables and cook until tender. 
4. Toss cooked pasta with the vegetable mix. 
5. Top with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh basil before serving.

Chicken Teriyaki.ingredients:
Chicken Breast
Soy Sauce
Brown Sugar
Garlic Powder
Ginger
Sesame Seeds (optional)
Chicken Teriyaki.instructions:
1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. 
2. In a bowl, mix soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic powder, and grated ginger. 
3. Marinate chicken in the sauce for at least 30 minutes. 
4. Heat a pan and cook chicken until browned and cooked through. 
5. Sprinkle with sesame seeds (optional) before serving.

Chocolate Chip Cookies.ingredients:
All-Purpose Flour
Butter
Brown Sugar
Granulated Sugar
Egg
Vanilla Extract
Baking Soda
Salt
Chocolate Chips
Chocolate Chip Cookies.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). 
2. Cream together butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar. 
3. Add egg and vanilla extract, mix well. 
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. 
5. Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet mixture. 
6. Stir in chocolate chips. 
7. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet. 
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are golden. 
9. Let cool on a wire rack.

Caprese Salad.ingredients:
Fresh Mozzarella Cheese
Tomatoes
Fresh Basil
Extra Virgin Olive Oil
Balsamic Vinegar
Salt
Black Pepper
Caprese Salad.instructions:
1. Slice fresh mozzarella cheese and tomatoes into rounds. 
2. Arrange them on a plate, alternating with fresh basil leaves. 
3. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and balsamic vinegar. 
4. Sprinkle with salt and black pepper to taste. 
5. Serve immediately.

Grilled Salmon with Lemon-Herb Butter.ingredients:
Salmon Fillets
Butter
Lemon Juice
Garlic
Fresh Herbs (parsley, thyme, rosemary)
Salt
Black Pepper
Grilled Salmon with Lemon-Herb Butter.instructions:
1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 
2. In a bowl, mix softened butter, lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped fresh herbs, salt, and black pepper. 
3. Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper. 
4. Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through. 
5. Top each fillet with a spoonful of lemon-herb butter before serving.
